org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc

Class OPCPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, RelationshipSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZipPackage 

    public abstract class OPCPackage
extends java.lang.Object
implements RelationshipSource, java.io.Closeable
    Represents a container that can store multiple data objects.(表示可以存储多个数据对象的容器。)

      • open

        public static OPCPackage open(java.lang.String path)
                       throws InvalidFormatException
        Open a package with read/write permission.(打开具有读/写权限的包。)
        Parameters:
        path - The document path.(路径-文档路径。)
        Returns:
        A Package object, else null.(包对象，否则为空。)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - If the specified file doesn't exist, and a parsing error occur.(InvalidSYS异常-如果指定的文件不存在，并且发生解析错误。)

      • open

        public static OPCPackage open(java.io.File file)
                       throws InvalidFormatException

      • open

        public static OPCPackage open(ZipEntrySource zipEntry)
                       throws InvalidFormatException
        Open an user provided ZipEntrySource with read-only permission. This method can be used to stream data into POI. Opposed to other open variants, the data is read as-is, e.g. there aren't any zip-bomb protection put in place.(打开用户提供的具有只读权限的ZipEntrySource。此方法可用于将数据流式传输到兴趣点。与其他开放变体相反，数据按原样读取，例如没有设置任何拉链炸弹保护。)
        Parameters:
        zipEntry - the custom source(zipEntry -自定义源)
        Returns:
        A Package object(软件包对象)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - if a parsing error occur.(InvalidSYS异常-如果发生解析错误。)

      • open

        public static OPCPackage open(java.lang.String path,
                              PackageAccess access)
                       throws InvalidFormatException,
                              InvalidOperationException
        Open a package.(打开包裹。)
        Parameters:
        path - The document path.(路径-文档路径。)
        access - PackageBase access.(访问- PackageBase访问。)
        Returns:
        A PackageBase object, else null.(PackageBase对象，否则为空。)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - If the specified file doesn't exist, and a parsing error occur.(InvalidSYS异常-如果指定的文件不存在，并且发生解析错误。)
        InvalidOperationException - If the zip file cannot be opened.(InvalidOperationResponse-如果无法打开压缩文件。)
        InvalidFormatException - if the package is not valid.(InvalidSYS异常-如果包无效。)

      • open

        public static OPCPackage open(java.io.InputStream in)
                       throws InvalidFormatException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Open a package. Note - uses quite a bit more memory than open(String), which doesn't need to hold the whole zip file in memory, and can take advantage of native methods(打开包裹。注意-比打开（字符串）使用更多的内存，打开（字符串）不需要在内存中保存整个压缩文件，并且可以利用本地方法)
        Parameters:
        in - The InputStream to read the package from(in -用于读取包的InputStream)
        Returns:
        A PackageBase object(PackageBase对象)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - Throws if the specified file exist and is not valid.(InvalidSYS异常-如果指定的文件存在且无效，则抛出。)
        java.io.IOException - If reading the stream fails(java.io. IOResponse-如果读取流失败)

      • openOrCreate

        public static OPCPackage openOrCreate(java.io.File file)
                               throws InvalidFormatException
        Opens a package if it exists, else it creates one.(如果包存在，则打开包，否则创建一个包。)
        Parameters:
        file - The file to open or to create.(文件-要打开或创建的文件。)
        Returns:
        A newly created package if the specified file does not exist, else the package extract from the file.(如果指定的文件不存在，则为新创建的包，否则从文件中提取包。)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - Throws if the specified file exist and is not valid.(InvalidSYS异常-如果指定的文件存在且无效，则抛出。)

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Flush the package : save all.(刷新包：保存全部。)
        See Also:
        close()

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Close the open, writable package and save its content. If your package is open read only, then you should call revert() when finished with the package. This method is not thread-safe.(关闭打开的可写包并保存其内容。如果您的包是只读打开的，那么您应该在完成包后调用revert（）。此方法不是线程安全的。)
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable(在界面中关闭java.io.Closeable)
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable(在界面中关闭java.lang.AutoCloseable)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO exception occur during the saving process.(IOException -如果在保存过程中发生IO异常。)

      • revert

        public void revert()
        Close the package WITHOUT saving its content. Reinitialize this package and cancel all changes done to it.(关闭包而不保存其内容。重新初始化此包并取消对其所做的所有更改。)

      • addThumbnail

        public void addThumbnail(java.lang.String path)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Add a thumbnail to the package. This method is provided to make easier the addition of a thumbnail in a package. You can do the same work by using the traditionnal relationship and part mechanism.(向包添加缩略图。提供此方法是为了更容易地在包中添加缩略图。您可以通过使用传统关系和部分机制来做同样的工作。)
        Parameters:
        path - The full path to the image file.(路径-图像文件的完整路径。)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)

      • addThumbnail

        public void addThumbnail(java.lang.String filename,
                         java.io.InputStream data)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Add a thumbnail to the package. This method is provided to make easier the addition of a thumbnail in a package. You can do the same work by using the traditionnal relationship and part mechanism.(向包添加缩略图。提供此方法是为了更容易地在包中添加缩略图。您可以通过使用传统关系和部分机制来做同样的工作。)
        Parameters:
        filename - The full path to the image file.(文件名-图像文件的完整路径。)
        data - the image data(数据-图像数据)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)

      • getPartsByRelationshipType

        public java.util.ArrayList<PackagePart> getPartsByRelationshipType(java.lang.String relationshipType)
        Retrieve parts by relationship type.(按关系类型卸载零件。)
        Parameters:
        relationshipType - Relationship type. Must not be null.(relationshipType -关系类型。不得为空。)
        Returns:
        All parts which are the target of a relationship with the specified type. If no such parts are found, the list is empty.(作为与指定类型关系的目标的所有部件。如果没有找到此类零件，则列表为空。)
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException - If called on a write-only package.(InvalidOperationResponse-如果对只读写包调用。)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if relationshipType input param is null.(java.lang. IllegalArgument例外-如果relationshipType输入参数为空。)

      • getPartsByName

        public java.util.List<PackagePart> getPartsByName(java.util.regex.Pattern namePattern)
        Retrieve parts by name(按名称检索零件)
        Parameters:
        namePattern - The pattern for matching the names(namePattern -匹配名称的模式)
        Returns:
        All parts associated to the specified content type, sorted in alphanumerically by the part-name(与指定内容类型关联的所有部分，按部分名称按字母顺序排序)

        public PackagePart getPart(PackageRelationship partRel)
        Get the target part from the specified relationship.(从指定关系中获取目标零件。)
        Parameters:
        partRel - The part relationship uses to retrieve the part.(PartRel -用于检索零件的零件关系。)

      • getParts

        public java.util.ArrayList<PackagePart> getParts()
                                          throws InvalidFormatException
        Load the parts of the archive if it has not been done yet. The relationships of each part are not loaded. Note - Rule M4.1 states that there may only ever be one Core Properties Part, but Office produced files will sometimes have multiple! As Office ignores all but the first, we relax Compliance with Rule M4.1, and ignore all others silently too.(如果尚未加载存档的部分，请加载该部分。每个部分的关系都没有加载。注意-规则M4.1规定只能有一个核心属性部件，但Office生成的文件有时会有多个！由于Office忽略了除第一项外的所有内容，因此我们放松了对规则M4.1的遵守，并默默地忽略了所有其他内容。)
        Returns:
        All this package's parts.(这个包裹的所有部件。)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - if the package is not valid.(InvalidSYS异常-如果包无效。)

      • createPart

        public PackagePart createPart(PackagePartName partName,
                              java.lang.String contentType)
        Create and add a part, with the specified name and content type, to the package.(使用指定的名称和内容类型创建部件并将其添加到包中。)
        Parameters:
        partName - Part name.(PartName -零件名称。)
        contentType - Part content type.(contentType -部件内容类型。)
        Returns:
        The newly created part.(新创建的部分。)
        Throws:
        PartAlreadyExistsException - If rule M1.12 is not verified : Packages shall not contain equivalent part names and package implementers shall neither create nor recognize packages with equivalent part names.(PartAlreadyDeliverstsResponse-如果规则M1.12未经验证：包不得包含等效的部件名称，并且包实现者不得创建或识别具有等效部件名称的包。)
        See Also:
        createPartImpl(PackagePartName, String, boolean)

      • createPart

        public PackagePart createPart(PackagePartName partName,
                              java.lang.String contentType,
                              java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream content)
        Add a part to the package.(将零件添加到包中。)
        Parameters:
        partName - Part name of the part to create.(PartName -要创建的零件的零件名称。)
        contentType - type associated with the file(contentType -与文件关联的类型)
        content - the contents to add. In order to have faster operation in document merge, the data are stored in memory not on a hard disk(content -要添加的内容。为了在文档合并中具有更快的操作，数据存储在内存中而不是硬盘上)
        Returns:
        The new part.(新部分。)
        See Also:
        createPart(PackagePartName, String)

      • addPackagePart

        protected PackagePart addPackagePart(PackagePart part)
        Add the specified part to the package. If a part already exists in the package with the same name as the one specified, then we replace the old part by the specified part.(将指定零件添加到包中。如果包中已经存在与指定名称相同的部件，那么我们用指定的部件替换旧部件。)
        Parameters:
        part - The part to add (or replace).(零件-要添加（或替换）的零件。)
        Returns:
        The part added to the package, the same as the one specified.(添加到包中的零件，与指定的零件相同。)
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException - If rule M1.12 is not verified : Packages shall not contain equivalent part names and package implementers shall neither create nor recognize packages with equivalent part names.(InvalidOperationResponse-如果规则M1.12未经验证：包不得包含等效的部件名称，并且包实现者不得创建或识别具有等效部件名称的包。)

      • removePart

        public void removePart(PackagePart part)
        Remove the specified part in this package. If this part is relationship part, then delete all relationships in the source part.(删除此程序包中的指定部件。如果此零件是关系零件，则删除源零件中的所有关系。)
        Parameters:
        part - The part to remove. If null, skip the action.(零件-要删除的零件。如果为空，则跳过该操作。)
        See Also:
        removePart(PackagePartName)

      • removePart

        public void removePart(PackagePartName partName)

      • removePartRecursive

        public void removePartRecursive(PackagePartName partName)
                         throws InvalidFormatException
        Remove a part from this package as well as its relationship part, if one exists, and all parts listed in the relationship part. Be aware that this do not delete relationships which target the specified part.(从此包中删除部件及其关系部件（如果存在），以及关系部件中列出的所有部件。请注意，这不会删除针对指定零件的关系。)
        Parameters:
        partName - The name of the part to delete.(PartName -要删除的零件的名称。)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - Throws if the associated relationship part of the specified part is not valid.(InvalidSYS异常-如果指定部分的关联关系部分无效，则抛出。)

      • deletePart

        public void deletePart(PackagePartName partName)
        Delete the part with the specified name and its associated relationships part if one exists. Prefer the use of this method to delete a part in the package, compare to the remove() methods that don't remove associated relationships part.(删除具有指定名称的零件及其关联关系零件（如果存在）。宁愿使用此方法删除包中的部分，与不删除关联关系部分的remove（）方法进行比较。)
        Parameters:
        partName - Name of the part to delete(PartName -要删除的零件的名称)

      • deletePartRecursive

        public void deletePartRecursive(PackagePartName partName)
        Delete the part with the specified name and all part listed in its associated relationships part if one exists. This process is recursively apply to all parts in the relationships part of the specified part. Prefer the use of this method to delete a part in the package, compare to the remove() methods that don't remove associated relationships part.(删除具有指定名称的零件及其关联关系零件中列出的所有零件（如果存在）。这个过程是递归地应用到所有的部分在关系部分的指定部分。宁愿使用此方法删除包中的部分，与不删除关联关系部分的remove（）方法进行比较。)
        Parameters:
        partName - Name of the part to delete(PartName -要删除的零件的名称)

      • containPart

        public boolean containPart(PackagePartName partName)
        Check if a part already exists in this package from its name.(从其名称检查该包中是否已存在零件。)
        Parameters:
        partName - Part name to check.(PartName -要检查的零件名称。)
        Returns:
        true if the part is logically added to this package, else false.(如果该部分逻辑上添加到此包中，则为真，否则为假。)

      • addRelationship

        public PackageRelationship addRelationship(PackagePartName targetPartName,
                                           TargetMode targetMode,
                                           java.lang.String relationshipType,
                                           java.lang.String relID)
        Add a relationship to the package (except relationships part). Check rule M4.1 : The format designer shall specify and the format producer shall create at most one core properties relationship for a package. A format consumer shall consider more than one core properties relationship for a package to be an error. If present, the relationship shall target the Core Properties part. Check rule M1.25: The Relationships part shall not have relationships to any other part. Package implementers shall enforce this requirement upon the attempt to create such a relationship and shall treat any such relationship as invalid.(向包中添加关系（关系部分除外）。检查规则M4.1：格式设计者应为一个包指定，格式制作者应为一个包创建最多一个核心属性关系。格式消费者应将包的多个核心属性关系视为错误。如果存在，该关系应针对核心属性部分。检查规则M1.25：关系部分不得与任何其他部分有关系。包实现者在尝试创建此类关系时应强制执行此要求，并应将任何此类关系视为无效。)
        Specified by:
        addRelationship in interface RelationshipSource(接口中的addRelationshipSource)
        Parameters:
        targetPartName - Target part name.(targetPartName -目标零件名称。)
        targetMode - Target mode, either Internal or External.(targetMode -目标模式，内部或外部。)
        relationshipType - Relationship type.(relationshipType -关系类型。)
        relID - ID of the relationship.(relID -关系的ID。)
        Returns:
        The newly created and added relationship(新建立和添加的关系)
        See Also:
        PackageRelationshipTypes

      • addRelationship

        public PackageRelationship addRelationship(PackagePartName targetPartName,
                                           TargetMode targetMode,
                                           java.lang.String relationshipType)

      • addExternalRelationship

        public PackageRelationship addExternalRelationship(java.lang.String target,
                                                   java.lang.String relationshipType)
        Adds an external relationship to a part (except relationships part). The targets of external relationships are not subject to the same validity checks that internal ones are, as the contents is potentially any file, URL or similar.(将外部关系添加到零件（关系零件除外）。外部关系的目标不需要接受与内部关系相同的有效性检查，因为内容可能是任何文件、URL或类似内容。)
        Specified by:

        Returns:

        See Also:

      • replaceContentType

        public boolean replaceContentType(java.lang.String oldContentType,
                                  java.lang.String newContentType)
        Replace a content type in this package.

        A typical scneario to call this method is to rename a template file to the main format, e.g. ".dotx" to ".docx" ".dotm" to ".docm" ".xltx" to ".xlsx" ".xltm" to ".xlsm" ".potx" to ".pptx" ".potm" to ".pptm"

        For example, a code converting a .xlsm macro workbook to .xlsx would look as follows: 

        

     OPCPackage pkg = OPCPackage.open(new FileInputStream("macro-workbook.xlsm"));
     pkg.replaceContentType(
         "application/vnd.ms-excel.sheet.macroEnabled.main+xml",
         "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet.main+xml");

     FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream("workbook.xlsx");
     pkg.save(out);
     out.close();

        (替换此包中的内容类型。调用此方法的典型方案是将模板文件重命名为主格式，例如将“.dotx”改为“.docx”、.dotm”改为“.docm”、. xlyx”到“.xlsx”、.xlTM”到“. xlsim”“. potx”到“. ppyx””。potm”到“. pptex”例如，将. xlsim宏工作簿转换为.xlsx的代码如下所示： OPCPack pkg = OPCPackage.open（新的文件输入流（“macro-workbook. xlsim”））; pkg.replaceContentType（ “应用程序/vnd.ms-excel.sheet. macroUtiled.main+ html”， “应用程序/vnd. openxmlformats-officedoctor.spreadsheetml.sheet.main+ html”）; 文件OutputStream out =新文件OutputStream（“workbook.xlsx”）; pkg.save; out.close（）;)
        Parameters:
        oldContentType - the content type to be replaced(oldContentType -要替换的内容类型)
        newContentType - the replacement(newContentType -替代品)
        Returns:
        whether replacement was successful(更换是否成功)
        Since:
        POI-3.8

      • registerPartAndContentType

      • getUnusedPartIndex

        public int getUnusedPartIndex(java.lang.String nameTemplate)
                       throws InvalidFormatException
        Get an unused part index based on the namePattern, which doesn't exist yet and has the lowest positive index(根据namePattern获取未使用的零件索引，该名称尚不存在且正指数最低)
        Parameters:
        nameTemplate - The template for new part names containing a '#' for the index, e.g. "/ppt/slides/slide#.xml"(nameMap-包含索引“#”的新部件名称的模板，例如“/GPT/slides/slide#. html”)
        Returns:
        the next available part name index(下一个可用的零件名称索引)
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - if the nameTemplate is null or doesn't contain the index char (#) or results in an invalid part name(InvalidSYS异常-如果nameMap为空或不包含索引char（#）或导致无效的部件名称)
